dct_title_s: Totius Africæ tabula, & descriptio uniuersalis, etiam ultra Ptolemæi limites extensa
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Text on verso: Africae nova descriptio, quæ peninsulæ instar undique ferè mari cingitur ... From: Cosmographiae uniuersalis lib. VI ... / autore Sebast. Munstero. Basileae : Apud Henrichum Petrum, 1554. Historic Maps copy varies from edition of 1542, described by Norwich (Norwich 3), which has three place names printed upside down.
